allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: resolve Render deployment build failure and environment variable loading

- Move @nestjs/cli, typescript, and ts-node to dependencies for Render builds
- Add dotenv.config\(\) at application startup in main.ts
- Remove duplicate dotenv loading from database.config.ts

This fixes two critical issues:
1. Render build failing with "nest: not found" error
2. Environment variables loading 0 values when running compiled code

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
